code: export async function api(path){let method=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'GET';let body=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;let token=arguments.length>3?arguments[3]:undefined;const res=await fetch("http://localhost:8080".concat(path),{method,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:body?JSON.stringify(body):undefined});return res.json();}
